Description: Papyrus, written with black ink, legal document with 4 witness copies dated year 13 of Ptolemy II Philadelphos - Cession of tombs from father's estate to daughter by uncle.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.48-50, pl.36, 39)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (47616) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/47616)

Associated names: Named in inscription: Ptolemy II Philadelphos
